RTCIceCandidatePairStatsResponsesSent.summary:
The dictionary's
responsesSent property indicates the total number of
STUN connectivity check responses that have been sent so far on the
connection described by this pair of candidates.
RTCIceCandidatePairStatsResponsesSent.value:
An integer value indicating the number of times a response has been sent to a
STUN connectivity check request.
NOTENote: Since it isn't possible to tell the difference between
connectivity check requests and consent requests, this value includes both.
